title: Salmon Nigiri
description: Freshly sliced salmon on a bed of perfectly seasoned rice. A classic favorite!

title: Tuna Roll
description: Delicious tuna wrapped in soft rice and crispy seaweed. A must-try roll!

title: Miso Soup
description: Warm and savory miso broth with tofu, seaweed, and scallions. Comfort in a bowl.

title: Mochi Dessert
description: Chewy mochi balls filled with creamy ice cream. A sweet Japanese delight.

title: Avocado Roll
description: Smooth avocado with fresh rice and crisp seaweed. Light and tasty!
